          <title>
            <string language="hu">Simone Martini: Szent Márton visszautasítja a katonai szolgálatot</string>
            <string language="en">Simone Martini: Saint Martin refuse the millitary service</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Simone Martini: Heiliger Martin Abfall der

          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Simone Martini: Szent Márton visszautasítja a katonai szolgálatot, 1317 k. Assisi, San Francesco, alsó templom, Szent Márton-kápolna, freskó.</string>
            <string language="en">Simone Martini: Saint Martin refuse the millitary service, about 1317 Assisi, San Francesco, bottom church, Saint Martin-chapel, fresco.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Simone Martini,  Szent Márton,  Assisi,  Siena,  Martini,  </string>
            <string language="en">Simone Martini,  Szent Martin,  Assisi,  Siena,  Martini,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Simone Martini: Heiliger Martin Abfall der 
millitary Service, ungefähr 1317 Assisi, San Francesco, untere 
Kirche, Heiliger Martin-Kapelle, Fresko.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Simone Martini : Ordures de saint Martin le
service millitary, environ 1317 Assisi, San Francesco, église 
inférieure, Martin-chapelle de Saint, fresque.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Simone Martini: Recusa de saint Martin o 
serviço millitary, aproximadamente 1317 Assisi, San Francesco, igreja
inferior, Martin-martin-chapel de Saint, fresco.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Simone Martini: Rifiuti del Martin santo il
servizio millitary, circa 1317 Assisi, San Francesco, chiesa 
inferiore, Martin-martin-chapel del San, fresco.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Simone martini: Αγιος Martin αρνείται τη
millitary υπηρεσία, περίπου 1317 Assisi, SAN 
Francesco, κατώτατη εκκλησία, Martin-parekklisj Αγίου, 
νωπογραφία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Simone Martini: Basura de santo Martin el 
servicio millitary, cerca de 1317 Assisi, San Francesco, iglesia 
inferior, Martin-capilla de Santo, fresco.</string>
          </description>
